title: Turkish pizza
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '200g minced lamb', '1 red onion, finely sliced', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '100g cherry tomatoes, halved or 2 medium tomatoes, diced', '2 large garlic and coriander naan breads', 'Fresh mint or coriander leaves, roughly chopped', '3 -4 tablespoons plain Greek yogurt', '2 -3 tablespoons pomegranate seeds']
